name: Super Chop
description:
Super Chop is the post compo version of my Ludum Dare 33 entry.

Check out the compo page here:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

I'm also on twitter

@savethejets

Controls

Left/Right - Move player

Space - Start Chopping / Chop

Note I used 2 CC fonts

TomAndJerry by StePickford

Adventurer by BrianJSmith

Check them out on http://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/
